implementation.useCase: Amazon Connect uses Claude to power Amazon Q in Connect, an AI-driven customer service assistant that provides real-time support to agents handling complex issues and offers immediate self-service options to end-customers across voice and digital channels.
implementation.problem: Two fundamental challenges in customer service: 1) How to help agents efficiently handle complex support requests while maintaining quality, and 2) How to give end-customers immediate answers without long wait times. Agents spend significant time searching through documentation and disparate applications while customers wait for answers.

metrics.metric: time savings on every customer contact through AI-assisted support for businesses like Orbit
metrics.sourceText: The impact extends beyond just handle times—businesses like Orbit have reported 10-15% time savings on every customer contact through AI-assisted support.

qualitativeBenefits.benefit: Improved agent capability to handle difficult cases
qualitativeBenefits.detail: Agents who would normally transfer difficult contacts can now solve them
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: For one customer pilot, their average handle time actually increased. But this is because agents who normally would just transfer away hard contacts could now solve them

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Customers receive instant responses instead of waiting 30 minutes
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: Instead of waiting 30 minutes for answers, they receive instant, personalized responses based on their full context and history.

qualitativeBenefits.benefit: Reduced need for transfers and repeat explanations
qualitativeBenefits.detail: Better equipped agents avoid transfers and customers don't need to repeat themselves
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: When they do need to speak with an agent, they connect with someone better equipped to help thanks to AI assistance, avoiding transfers and repeat explanations.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Supports customer service in 61 languages without additional training
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: Supports customer service in 61 languages without additional training

technicalDetails.promptEngineering: Customizable prompt templates for unique voice, policies and workflows
technicalDetails.challenges: Traditional AI works well for certain scenarios, but more complex interactions involving language nuances and ambiguous questions required more sophisticated AI capabilities
technicalDetails.solutions: Implemented Claude to handle ambiguous and highly-fluid self-service use cases while enabling human agents to focus on complex issues
